li.p: Do I have to do anything?

ul.li: For Annual billing cycles: Upon renewal, your current DevOps licenses will be automatically upgraded to Floating licenses at no additional charge.
For Monthly billing cycles: Upon renewal, you can choose between Monthly Node-locked licenses or Annual Floating licenses. For pricing details, see the example in the table above.

li.p: What if I donâ€™t want to upgrade from Monthly KRE DevOps to Annual Floating licenses after six months?

ul.li: You will have the option to switch to a monthly billing for KRE Node-locked licenses.

li.p: Can I use the DevOps license for another three months and come back for another three months?

ul.li: No, it will need to be consecutive, with a maximum of 6 months. Once you cancel your DevOps subscription, it will no longer be available for repurchase.

li.p: My team purchased our licenses via a reseller. Will this change affect me?

ul.li: Your team will still be able to use your licenses as per the explanation in the table above. Upon renewal, kindly contact your reseller for more information. Alternatively, contact us at success@katalon.com for renewal.
For further support, you can submit a ticket at our support portal: Katalon Support.
